channel.title: Emotion on Simba Tango

item.title: Technique vs. Feeling
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ my hovercraft is full of eels Which one is most important? Technique or dancing with feeling? I sometimes get the impression that tango dancers are divided in two camps, the technique camp and the feelings camp. The first emphasizes the technical matters of the dance, the latter paying solely attention to the feeling. As long as we can hug each other, all is well ;-) Both seemingly ignoring the other point of view completely.
